title: back to bronze..
body: Is it right that there's no coming back to some division u left? cause i got ranked up to silver, and someone told me that u'll never go back to bronze even if u lost many games at 0 lp? is that right?

replies.body: That's not correct!  It's possible that your MMR can drop enough to place you from Silver to Bronze.  Matchmaking will continue to place and move you around depending on your best fit.  More information is also available in our[ ranked play ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!

From what I've experienced, it's not "impossible" but it's still *much harder* to get demoted from Gold5 to Silver1 than it is to get demoted from SilverN to SilverN-1. I lost many matches while at 0 LP in G5, and was never demoted.

I can't see any info about that in the FAQ, no difference between division demotion versus tiers demotion is mentioned at all. The rumors say that you need to have an MMR equivalent to Silver5 to get demoted from Gold5 into Silver, can you confirm it? (And potentially add it to the FAQ?)
TY this seem to be more convincing
no but it takes more losses
